mms.controller.interfaces

Interface ICustomerStatsController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerStatsController

    public interface ICustomerStatsController
    Interface that define the CustomerStatsController.
    Author:
    Luca Pascucci, Filippo Nicolini, Alessandro Bagnoli
